item.title: v2.7 – Flying Rabbit RC 3
item.description:
🚀 v2.7 Flying Rabbit RC 3 – Release Highlights! 🐇🪽

✨ What's New?
🛠️ Fixed LSUIElement issues for a better experience
🎛️ Updated Media Remote Adapter for improved device support
👀 Default sneak peek enabled – easier previews!
🛡️ New SECURITY.md for better project safety
📆 Calendar UI fixes and scrolling improvements for effortless scheduling
🖼️ Artwork UI enhancements for a prettier look
📢 Improved calendar reminders so you never miss a thing
🌍 Localization & dependency updates for global users

🙌 New Contributors
🎉 @CrossTR15YT joined the team!
🎉 @naq7826 made their first contribution!

🔗 Full Changelog: v2.7-rc.2...v2.7-rc.3
Thanks to all contributors: @Alexander5015, @naq7826, @CrossTR15YT

💾 Download: BeautifulCow.dmg
Update now and hop into the new features! 🐰✨

item.title: 2.7-rc.2 Flying Rabbit 🐇🪽
item.description:
🐇 boring.notch v2.7 – Flying Rabbit RC 2

Release Candidate - August 4, 2025

✨ What's New & Improved

  • 🎵 Better Media Controller Stability: Improved stability and app support by replacing blocking semaphores with async/await in music controllers. (by @weitheng & @Alexander5015)
  • 🔧 MediaRemote Adapter Updates: Enhanced stability and better app support in MediaRemote Adapter. (by @Alexander5015)
  • 🔔 YouTube Music Controller Fixes: Resolved notification handling issues in YouTube Music Controller. (by @Alexander5015)

— The Boring Team

item.title: 2.7-rc.1 Flying Rabbit 🐇🪽
item.description:
🐇 boring.notch v2.7 – Flying Rabbit RC 1

Release Candidate - July 27, 2025

✨ What's New & Improved

  • 🛠️ Fixed hanging issues: Resolved stability concerns by addressing test instability. (by @Alexander5015)
  • 📅 Calendar Settings Resolved: Calendar settings now update correctly with authorization; proper show/hide.
  • 🎵 YouTube Music Controller:
    • Improved shuffle and repeat UX, beta features for shuffle/repeat now available.
    • Fixed seek control bugs and added forced polling.
    (by @pranav1st & @Alexander5015)
  • 🔲 MediaRemoteAdapter.Framework updated
  • 🔃 Button order and repeat toggle improved: Better player button logic and new repeat toggle.
  • 🐞 Now Playing Controller Beta: Beta enhancements and settings (known bugs remain for testing).
  • ♻️ Shuffle is now always enabled.
  • 💡 Refactored Shuffle & Repeat: toggleShuffle/toggleRepeat refactored for improved experience.

— The Boring Team

item.title: 2.7-rc.0 Flying Rabbit 🐇🪽
item.description:
🎉 Release v2.7 Flying Rabbit RC 0 — Boring Notch

We're thrilled to announce Boring Notch v2.7: Flying Rabbit RC 0, packed with powerful new features, polish, and community contributions!

🚀 Highlights

  • 🔋 Enhanced Battery Status \& Charging Experience Thanks to @AlexLemus-Dev
    • More informative battery menu: percentage, max capacity, charging, low power, and status icons
    • Configurable battery indicators, notifications, and display options
    • Interactive battery icon with detailed info and instant System Preferences access
    • Visual alignment and consistent styling (macOS-like bolt/plug icons, dark mode, etc.)
    • Optimized and documented code, robust error handling, and improved performance
    • Details \& Demo
  • 🖥️ Fullscreen Detection \& Playback Management Fixes @Alexander5015 improved reliability of media controls during fullscreen transitions
    • PR #449
  • 🦷 Allow 0 Height Notch Now supports notches with zero height for enhanced layout flexibility
    • Thanks, @yaxarat! PR #397
  • 🎛️ Multiple Media Controllers Control and display several media controllers at once
    • PR #460
  • 👀 Sneak Peek \& Jiggle Fixes Re-added sneak peek and improved animation stability
    • PR #409
  • 🗓️ New Calendar Service Seamlessly integrates your calendar into Boring Notch
    • PR #589
  • 📄 Updated LICENSE Keeping compliance and clarity up to date
    • PR #590
  • 🆕 Onboarding \& Better Settings Window Streamlined onboarding and redesigned settings for easy configuration
    • PR #600
  • 📸 Camera Toggle Feature New camera quick toggle, privacy-first!
    • Added by @Steve-sy PR #598
  • 🎵 MediaRemote Adapter Support Improved compatibility with MediaRemote devices
    • PR #631

🆕 Welcoming First-Time Contributors!

Contributor PR Link
@sancho1952007 (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/431)
@Ein-Tim (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/405)
@AlexLemus-Dev (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/437)
@yaxarat (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/397)
@ShirakawaMio (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/399)
@divyanshu0469 (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/454)
@oorischubert (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/409)
@Al3Gr (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/493)
@ChemicalChaos-Fabian42 (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/509)
@Davetheword (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/501)
@Steve-sy (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/598)

🛠️ Other Improvements

  • Visual and animation refinements for battery/media indicators
  • Enhanced error handling, code reorganization, and extensive documentation
  • Optimizations for consistent performance across all system conditions

Thank you 🌟 to everyone—new and returning—for their effort in making this release feature-rich, steady, and super fun!

Try Boring Notch v2.7 — Flying Rabbit RC 0 and let us know what you think!

— The Boring Notch Team

item.title: 2.6 🎉 Wolf Painting 🐺
item.description:
🎉 v2.6 🚀 Wolf Painting 🐺

We're thrilled to announce the release of Wolf Painting version 2.6! 🎊 This major update brings numerous improvements and new features that will make your experience even more enjoyable.


Download from here

🤔 What's Changed? 🤓

  • 🧠 Improved memory management and thread safety across the app
  • 🎥 Enhanced webcam handling with better session lifecycle management
  • 🎨 Added option to choose between classic and modern notch animations
  • ⚡️ Improved fullscreen detection with Finder exclusion
  • 🔄 Better hover state handling and reduced animation flicker
  • 🔋 Enhanced power status notifications and battery indicators
  • ⚙️ Improved screen lock and display change handling
  • 🎵 Better music playback state tracking and elapsed time accuracy
  • ✨ Added "Buy us a coffee" option in Welcome screen
  • ⚠️ Added warning badges for unsupported extensions
  • 🐛 Various bug fixes and stability improvements
  • For more details, check out our website

item.title: 2.5 🎉 Jellyfin Snoring 🪼 (Streaming)
item.description:
🎉 v2.5 🚀 Jellyfin Snoring 🪼 (Dreaming)

We're thrilled to announce the release of Jellyfin Snoring version 2.5! 🎊 This major update brings numerous improvements and new features that will make your experience even more enjoyable.


🤔 What's Changed? 🤓

  • 🧠 Taught our app that RAM isn't an all-you-can-eat buffet (fixed those pesky memory leaks that made your computer think it was training ChatGPT)
  • Improved full-screen media detection (Thanks @MicroVisionKit!)
  • Jiggly wobbly notch open and close animation.
  • Fixed AirDrop invisible window issue and improved error handling 📱
  • Improved gesture sensitivity and controls 🖐️
  • Better performance optimizations ⚡
  • Fixed various minor bugs and stability issues 🐛
  • For more details, check out our website.

item.title: 2.4 🚀 Exciting new features and improvements
item.description:
🎉 v2.4 🚀 Exciting new features and improvements

We're excited to bring you version 2.4 of Jolly Dolphin 🐬 (Dreaming) with some amazing new features and improvements! 🎊


🤔 What's Changed? 🤓

  • 🧠 Taught our app that RAM isn't an all-you-can-eat buffet (fixed those pesky memory leaks that made your computer think it was training ChatGPT)
  • Fixed AirDrop invisible window issue and improved error handling 📱
  • Improved gesture sensitivity and controls 🖐️
  • Better memory management and performance optimizations ⚡
  • Enhanced UI responsiveness across virtual desktops 🖥️
  • Fixed various minor bugs and stability issues 🐛

item.title: 2.3 🚀 New release with bug fixes and great additions
item.description:
🎉 v2.3 🚀 New release with bug fixes and great additions

We're thrilled to announce the release of Glowing Panda version 2.3! 🎊 This major update brings numerous improvements and new features that will make your experience even more enjoyable.


🤔 What's Changed? 🤓

  • Fixed a bug that caused shelf to be unresponsive to drag and drop @Alexander 🛠️
  • Fixed a bug that caused sliding text to be unvisible 📝
  • Fixed a bug that re-enabled music live activity on media actions 🎵
  • Fixed a bug that caused the app flickering when Apple Intelligence windows were open @Alexander 🌟
  • Settings window won't open on start @Alexander 🛠️
  • New feature for battery that reflects low-power mode by @freepicheep 🔋
  • Preparing for custom animations in the live activity 🎉
  • Boring notch now stays centered around the notch when changing virtual desktops. 🌟
  • Keyboard shortcut I added to toggle the entire notch. @freepicheep 📝

item.title: 🎉 v2.2 🚀 New release with bug fixes and great additions
item.description:
🎉 v2.2 🚀 New release with bug fixes and great additions

We're thrilled to announce the release of Glowing Panda version 2.2! 🎊 This major update brings numerous improvements and new features that will make your experience even more enjoyable.


🤔 What's Changed? 🤓

  • Calendar & Behavior: 📅 Fixed calendar data handling and behavior issues (Thanks @LostCause!)
  • Music Features: 🎵 Added keyboard shortcut for music sneakPeek (Thanks @freepicheep!) and improved Mirror logic (Thanks @LostCause!)
  • App Management: 🔄 Implemented app restart functionality (Thanks @LostCause!)
  • Media Player: 🎬 New timeline slider and centered controls with tinting options (Based on @LostCause's work)
  • Live Activity: 📱 Added option to disable music live activity
  • UI Improvements: 🎨 Fixed sizing and spacing issues, especially notch content overlap
  • Gesture System: 🤚 Improved gesture logic (Thanks @LostCause!)
  • Header Update: 🔄 Removed "Glowing 🐼" text from header
  • Settings Enhancement: ⚙️ Added new Appearance and Shortcuts tabs

item.title: 🎉 v2.1 – Glowing Panda: The Update You've Been Waiting For (Sort Of) 😜
item.description:
🎉 v2.0 – Glowing Panda: The Update You've Been Waiting For (Sort Of) 😜

We're thrilled to announce the release of Glowing Panda version 2.0! 🎊 This major update brings numerous improvements and new features that will make your experience even more enjoyable.


🤔 What's New? 🤓

  • Rewritten Layout: The Speed Demon 🏃‍♂️ Our layout has been reworked for better performance, making it faster and smoother. We've also added some fancy animations to keep things interesting 😎
  • Polished Managers: The Playback Pro 🎵 Playback managers have been revamped to ensure a seamless experience. No more buffering or crashes – we've got this covered 💪
  • Calendar & Music Activity: The Visual Showstopper 📆 A fancy blur background behind music activity has been added to enhance the app's visual appeal. It's like a mini-movie in your app 🍿
  • Customization Options: Make it Yours (Sort Of) 🎨 More customization options have been introduced to personalize your glow. We've also added some new emojis to make things more fun 🤪
  • Improved Settings: Don't Lose Your Stuff 🗂️ New and improved settings that actually save changes 🔄. No more wondering where you put that pesky setting 🔍
  • Resource Management Optimizations: The Secret Sauce ⚙️ Our resource management has been optimized for a faster app. We've also added some secret sauce (just kidding, it's just good old-fashioned coding magic ✨)
  • Bug Fixes: 🚫 We've squashed some pesky bugs that caused issues with HUDs and Download Manager settings, shelf icon responsiveness, and General tab in Settings.
  • Update Check: 🔄 A new feature to check for updates in the Settings / About section has been added.
  • Non-Notch Display Customization: 🖥️ Customization options for non-notch displays have been introduced to ensure a seamless experience for all users.
  • GitHub Link Update: 🔄 The GitHub link in the settings has been updated to ensure easy access to the latest updates.
